Package dao

Class BaseConnector

java.lang.Object
dao.BaseConnector
Direct Known Subclasses:
RecipeDAO
public class BaseConnector
extends java.lang.Object
Information for connecting to the specific database. Encapsulated methods for starting, closing database connection and executing sql statements.
Author:
Hanzhi.Zhuang
